You have advanced Excel skills and communicate fluently in English, both verbally and in writing. Knowledge of any of the Nordic languages is advantageous.
 



  





 As a person, you are driven to lead and develop both the business, yourself, and your employees towards set goals. You have the ability to build positive relationships with different cultures and functions to promote good collaboration. You possess analytical capabilities that enable you to see both the big picture and understand details while prioritizing and making well-founded decisions according to goals and timelines.
 



  





**WHAT DO WE OFFER?** 




 We strive for collaboration across borders and create a workplace where joy, camaraderie, and work-life balance are prioritized. Our goal is for our employees to perform at their best and thrive optimally. We place great emphasis on our employees actively participating in their competence development and contributing to the company's growth. Through inclusive leadership, each employee is an important part of ensuring that we remain an attractive and successful employer.
 



  





**APPLICATION AND CONTACT** 




 For questions, please contact Group Supply Chain Director Henrik Kjær, +45 41 37 72 54
 



 Before employment, background checks and reference checks are conducted.
 



  





**Application due** 




 8/18/2024
 



  





**Position type** 




 Procurement
 



  





**Workplace** 




 To be decided
 



  





**Homepage** 





 scandistandard.com
 




  





**Contact** 




**Henrik Kjaer** 




 Head of Group Operations
 




 E-mail
 




 +45 41 37 72 54
 



  






 More vacant positions
 




  





**About Scandi Standard** 




 Scandi Standard is a producer of chilled, frozen and ready-made chicken products.
 



  





 The Group was founded in 2013 and is a listed company on Nasdaq Stockholm. The company is the dominant poultry producer in the Nordics and Ireland, and a leading player on the European market. The head quarter is situated in Stockholm and the company has production facilities in each country. The annual turnover is approx. 12 BSEK.
 



  





 Every day, in everything we do, we make sure that our products live up to the highest standards of quality, innovation and sustainability through our brands including well-known Danpo, Den Stolte Hane, Kronfågel, Manor Farm and Naapurin Maalaiskana.
 



  





 Our over 3000 team members work hard to provide good and healthy food to consumers and restaurants. They make sure families and people in the Nordic countries, Ireland and over 40 of our export markets around the world are fed with the best quality, tasty chicken.
 



  





 Our vision, A Better Chicken for a Better Life, and strategy describe what we want to achieve. Our mission and sustainability platform, The Scandi Way, together with our core values describe how we want to do it. We believe in collaboration, open-mindedness, engagement and empowerment. Our culture defines how we work together and it is the glue that helps us come together as a group. Our company is international, yet with all the traditions and quirks that come with being local. Through it all, our common and shared ambition to always keep trying to be better unites us as one.
 



  




* Openness – being transparent and honest, enabling us to help each other across countries and functions.
* Challenge – challenging both ourselves as well as our industry every day. We do this by always asking questions in order to find better solutions and continuously improve.
* Sense of urgency – meaning there’s no time to waste as time waits for no one.We stay relevant by acting quickly and smartly.



  





 We believe that the key to success is when every team member develops through driving continuous development of themself, the team, and the business while shaping a better future.For more information, see
 
 www.scandistandard.com

title: Lås- och passagesamordnare Familjebostäder
description:
Jobbet på Familjebostäder är inte ett vanligt jobb. Det är ett viktigt jobb. Vi bidrar till att Stockholm är en stad där alla kan bo bra. Vårt uppdrag är att se till att de som bor hos oss trivs och är trygga i det viktigaste de har; sina hem. Våra nybyggda hus möter moderna behov och de byggs på ett sätt som tar hänsyn till framtida generationer.
   

  

 För oss är hållbarhet också det rent mänskliga. Vi är högt rankade när det kommer till ledarskap och vi strävar alltid efter att du som jobbar hos oss ska få ihop din vardag: oavsett om det handlar om arbetstidens förläggning eller massage på arbetstid. Det är den omtanken som också avspeglas i vår värdegrund – i varje möte med våra kunder och hur vi är mot varandra. Har detta betydelse för dig vet vi att du kommer trivas. Välkommen till ett viktigt jobb.
   

  

 Vi söker nu en engagerad Lås- och passagesamordnare som kan ta ett helhetsansvar för skalskyddet i vårt omfattande fastighetsbestånd. Du kommer att vara en central spelare för vår förvaltningsorganisation och spela en nyckelroll i att säkerställa tryggheten och tillgängligheten för våra hyresgäster.
   

  

 I rollen som lås- och passagesamordnare kommer du att ta ett helhetsansvar för skalskyddet i Familjebostäders befintliga bestånd, som omfattar cirka 1000 byggnader över 400 fastigheter. Du blir en kompetensmässig förankringspunkt för förvaltningsorganisationen och ett viktigt beslutsstöd. Rapportering sker till närmaste chef och säkerhetschef.
   

  

 Det är viktigt att du trivs i en föränderlig miljö och gillar att ta eget ansvar. Du vill bidra till förändring och utveckling inom fastighetsbranschen. Möjligheten att utvecklas och växa inom bolaget är stor. Vill du veta mer om vad vi erbjuder för förmåner och hur några av våra medarbetare upplever att det är att jobba hos oss? Läs mer här
   

  

**Vi Erbjuder**
*Ett viktigt jobb*
 Vårt allmännyttiga samhällsuppdrag handlar om något av det finaste som finns, människors hem. Tillsammans utvecklar och förvaltar vi levande stadsdelar. Det är inte bara ett jobb. Det är ett uppdrag.
   

  

*Hållbarhet i fokus*
 Vi gör hållbara val när vi renoverar och bygger nytt för att minimera vår klimatpåverkan. Samtidigt är det lika viktigt för oss att jobba med trygghet i våra bostadsområden, för att livet mellan husen ska fungera.
   

  

*Ett starkt ledarskap*
 Våra ledare får höga betyg av våra medarbetare. De har förmågan att motivera, inspirera och visa uppskattning. Hos oss kommer du helt enkelt trivas och utvecklas.
   

  

*Balans mellan arbete och fritid*
 Massage på arbetstid, ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag och ett höjt semesterdagstillägg är bara några i raden av våra förmåner som gör det enkelt för dig som medarbetare att må bra.
   

  

*En levande företagskultur*
 Vår värdegrund ger oss ett starkt stöd i vardagen – i möten med våra kunder och hur vi är mot varandra. Hos oss får du engagerade, kundfokuserade kollegor med affärsmässighet och nytänkande i fokus.
   

  

**Dina Arbetsuppgifter**
* Planera och samordna lås- och passagearbetet med fokus på att utveckla och upprätthålla hög säkerhetsstandard.
* Ansvara för drift- och underhållsrelaterade frågor gällande lås och passage, inklusive hantering av behörigheter och tidzoner i passagesystem.
* Följ upp och samverka med låsentreprenörer för att säkerställa att alla säkerhetsåtgärder är uppdaterade och effektiva.
* Utveckla och förvalta styrande dokument för lås- och passage i samarbete med säkerhetschef.
* Säkerställ att alla relevanta dokument är uppdaterade och tillgängliga för rätt personer.
* Fungera som expert inom lås- och passageteknik och arrangera utbildningar för att dela med dig av din kunskap.


**Kvalifikationer**
* Relevant högskole-/universitetsutbildning eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet.
* Minst tre (3) års erfarenhet av en liknande roll med koppling till fastighetsförvaltning eller närliggande till fastighetsbranschen.
* Kvalificerad praktisk erfarenhet av lås- och passagesystem.
* God kännedom om lagar och bestämmelser inom området.
* Erfarenhet av entreprenad juridik ABT och AMA eller liknande standarder.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet om LOU eller andra upphandlingsprocesser.
* Erfarenhet av projektering, projektledning, installationssamordning, kvalitetsuppföljning och fastighetsbesiktningar inom området.
* Mycket god IT- och administrationsvana och erfarenhet av digitala arbetssätt.
* Utmärkt förmåga att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift i svenska och engelska.
* Innehar giltigt B körkort.


**Personliga Egenskaper**
* Initiativtagande och förmåga att prioritera är viktigt i rollen.
* Samarbetar väl över avdelningsgränser och med externa partners.
* Tar ett stort ansvar för arbetsuppgifter och säkerställer korrekt utförande i tid.
* Kommunicerar tydligt och effektivt både muntligt och skriftligt på svenska och engelska.


**Ansökan**
 Om du känner att du passar för rollen och vill vara med och utveckla säkerhetsarbetet hos Familjebostäder, skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande och ser fram emot att höra från dig. Kontakt HR-partner Fanny Johansson på 08-737 20 95 eller Dennis Bremberg, gruppchef underhåll och skador, på 08-737 23 33 om du har frågor eller vill veta mer om tjänsten.
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare i samband med rekryteringen. Samtliga av våra inköp sker i enlighet med LOU och för att kunna arbeta med oss så ska man ha varit med i upphandlingen och tecknat ett ramavtal.

title: Lead Risk Expert
description:
**Job ID: 24874** 






  

  



 At Nordea, we’re committed to being a partner our customers and society can count on. Compliance and integrity go hand in hand. Joining us means you’ll have an impact on how we do banking – today and tomorrow. So bring your ideas, skills and unique background. With us, you’ll be in good company with plenty of opportunities to collaborate, grow and make your mark on something bigger.
   

  





**About this opportunity** 


  
 





 Join our dynamic team at Nordea, one of the leading financial institutions in Europe. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards in risk management and regulatory compliance. As part of our continuous efforts to enhance our risk management capabilities, we are looking for a seasoned Lead Risk Expert to join our BCBS 239 Independent Validation Function.
 





  
 





 As a Lead Risk Expert within the BCBS 239 Independent Validation Function, you will play a crucial role in ensuring that our risk data aggregation and risk reporting practices meet the stringent requirements of BCBS 239. You will take a leading role in the independent validation efforts, assessing the effectiveness of our risk data aggregation processes, and ensuring the accuracy, integrity, and timeliness of risk reporting.
   

  


**What you’ll be doing:**




* Take a leading role in managing the independent validation of BCBS 239 compliance across the bank
* Evaluate the effectiveness of risk data aggregation and reporting processes
* Assess adherence to regulatory requirements and internal policies
* Develop and implement validation methodologies and frameworks
* Conduct a range of testing reviews, including quantitative and qualitative assessments of BCBS239 adherence
* Prepare comprehensive validation reports and present findings to senior management and relevant internal fora
* Collaborate with various departments, including Risk Management, IT and the business, to further develop the bank’s data governance and reporting practices
* Stay updated with regulatory changes and industry best practices related to BCBS 239




  
 


**Who you are**




 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.  
   

  

**To succeed in this role, we believe that you have:** 





* Excellent interpersonal and stakeholder management skills, being able to operate in cross-functional teams and manage multiple stakeholders
* Strong execution skills, being able to make the right priorities and deliver accurate, simple and effective solutions
* A structured mind-set, being able to see the big picture, as well as a strong attention to relevant details
* A flexible, open-minded and a strong cultural awareness
* Advanced analytical skills and attention to detail
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, including professional level spoken and written English



  

  


**Your experience and background:**




* Proven experience in independent validation work within a large European or international bank(s)
* In-depth understanding of BCBS 239 principles and requirements
* Strong background in risk management, data governance, and regulatory compliance
* Relevant academic qualifications, such as a degree in Finance, Economics, Business, or a related field



  

  



 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than
 



 01/07/2024
 



 . For more information, you’re welcome to contact Anders Dalgaard Petersen or Erik Wittrup.
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  
 





 Please be aware that any applications or CVs coming through email or direct messages will not be accepted or considered.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
 For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Poland:** 
 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following: 
 





  
 





 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. 
 





  
 





 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at: https://www.nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf.
 





  
 





 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: GROUP BUSINESS CONTROLLER
description:
**Group Business Controller**
 Are you excited about air travel and having a central role with exposure to multiple areas? Do you want to improve SAS's competitive position and contribute to SAS' transformation into a profitable and sustainable airline? If yes, the position as Group Business Controller could be something for you!
   

  

 SAS is in a very exciting period going through its biggest single financial restructuring in history, with the objective to recapitalize bringing in the amount of SEK 30 bn. In 2023, a consortium of investors – the biggest being Castlelake, AirFrance/KLM and the Danish State – agreed to provide the necessary funding, enabling SAS to proceed with completing the U.S. and Swedish legal processes.
   

  

 The pandemic years have been the most challenging in the history of the airline industry and has had a fundamental impact on SAS - from travel restrictions that were introduced early on to changes in travel patterns. That is why SAS has launched a broad restructuring program SAS FORWARD. It is a comprehensive business and financial transformation plan designed to secure SAS's long-term competitiveness. The plan is aimed at putting SAS on a solid financial footing, while at the same time investing in the areas we see as important for the future, such as digitization and sustainability.
   

  

**As Group Business Controller You Will**
 As Group Business Controller at SAS, you will become part of the Group Business Control team with a key role to support SAS delivery on its strategy and overall goals from a financial perspective. The team has an ambitious digitalization agenda going forward, with the objective to improve speed and agility on multiple dimensions. Our mission is to shift the perspective from reporting actuals to rolling next 13-months in granular level and up to 5-years in a more condensed, but still integrated planning.
   

  

 As Group Business Controller you own, develop and maintain processes linked to financial analysis, reporting, budgeting, forecasting, digitalization and KPI development. You report to the Head of Group Business Control and your workplace is in Frösundavik, Solna.
   

  

**Main duties**
* Be a key player in the enterprise financial planning process
* Monitor, report and follow up the financial performance of the Group and its business units with the objective to improve financial performance and meet targets
* Analysis and decision support, e.g. evaluating the effect of proposed change initiatives in SAS's overall strategic agenda
* Support digitalization initiatives within all aspects of financial planning and reporting
* Contribute to the consolidated monthly financial reporting and the budget/forecasting process
* Be a competence center for decision support, financial analysis and reporting through Business Control and Finance, which may for example include development and updating of KPI dashboards within the BI system environment


**Formal Qualifications For The Role**
* Solid experience in understanding business management, financial planning and analysis
* At least 4 - 6 years of work experience from similar roles in a large complex corporation and/or major global audit firm. Your personal skills and attributes (pls see “who we are looking for” below) will be more important than exact length of experience
* A relevant university degree in e.g. economics, finance or accounting
* Proven strong understanding of central financial processes such as financial statements, budgeting and forecasts
* Experience of consolidation at group level as well as solid understanding of accounting and preferably IFRS reporting
* Fluency in English and preferably also Swedish


**Who We Are Looking For**
 To fit the role, you have solid financial and business acumen based on an analytical mindset. You can easily take in a lot of information, see the big picture, understand the objectives and can independently develop solutions and suggestions for improvements while being meticulous in the details.
   

  

 You are passionate about data while being pedagogical and a strong communicator with proven ability to cooperate well with others, can challenge established views in a constructive way and can educate and present results through graphic presentations equally appropriate for senior executive management as for peers. You enjoy taking initiative to create high quality deliverables and are completely comfortable owning and operating various types of financial management processes and analyses. You see contacts and cooperation with stakeholders from different backgrounds as a natural part of ensuring high quality of deliveries. You have a flexible mindset and are driven by learning new things.
   

  

**About Us**
 SAS is Scandinavia's leading airline. For more than 75 years, we have been flying and connecting Scandinavia with the world and the world with Scandinavia. We have always been at the forefront of what is new and scouting the horizon. We have seen the world change, sometimes over a long period of time, and sometimes quite suddenly. Changes that have made us rethink, adapt and build new. We are moving towards a future where change and the need for new thinking is constant. A future of conscious thinking and sustainable innovation.
   

  

**SAS**
 SAS, Scandinavia’s leading airline, with main hubs in Copenhagen, Oslo and Stockholm, flies to destinations in Europe, USA and Asia. Spurred by a Scandinavian heritage and sustainability values, SAS aims to be the global leader in sustainable aviation. We will reduce total carbon emissions 25 percent by 2025, by using more sustainable aviation fuel and our modern fleet with fuel-efficient aircraft. In addition to flight operations, SAS offers ground handling services, technical maintenance and air cargo services. SAS is a founding member of the Star Alliance™, and together with its partner airlines offers a wide network worldwide.

title: SAP Senior Integration Consultant - Tietoevry Tech Services
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Do you have a strong technical background, passion for problem-solving and want to join one of the largest tech companies in the Nordics? Then this is the role for you!
   

  

 We are looking for a
 **SAP Senior Integration Consultant** 
 who wants to be part of Tietoevry Tech Services.
   

  

**When joining** 
**Tietoevry Tech Services as a SAP Senior Integration Consultant**
* You will be a part of transforming businesses on their S/4HANA journey and supporting existing landscapes
* You will be responsible for area of planning, designing, and implementing integration solutions to the customer SAP systems according to their business demands via your integration skills.
* You will work with an international diverse SAP team of about 400 professionals and numbers keep growing.
* Additionally, you will have the possibility work with Nordics customers across the borders.


**To rock this position, you have skills like:**
* Experience using SAP BTP as part of an overall architecture (especially customer assignments with SAP Integration Suite)
* Experience in modern integration technics with SAP (especially with S/4HANA) as part of a deployment project with SAP Integration Suite
* Ability to communicate with a variety of stakeholders (including business consultants, telecommunications experts, technical experts)
* SAP PI / PO expertise is considered an advantage
* Understanding and insight into extensive SAP environments
* Good interaction and presentation skills as well as fluent English and Swedish language skills
* You will play a key role in S/4HANA deployment projects and experience in managing and designing technical work will be counted as a big plus. We expect you to convince customers not only by your SAP skills but also by communication. You are independent and productive, and you help others on the team.


**What’s in it for you?**
 We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, open culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We offer you and opportunity to create the future of a growing and fast developing and important sector. We believe that our organisational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.
   

  

**Join us and make your mark!**
 We look forward to your application!
   

  

 Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we’ll reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact hiring manager Antti Kurkinen via e-mail antti.a.kurkinen@tietoevry.com
   

  

 Hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

 Location: Sweden
   

  

*Tietoevry thrives with diversity, and we welcome applicants of all genders, ages, abilities, ethnicities, orientations, beliefs, and backgrounds.*
**About Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.
   

  

 Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs.
   

  

 Creating purposeful technology to reinvent the world for good

title: Account Executive / Sales Director for a Startup (August 2024)
description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**🚀 Industry experts: Launch Your Startup Journey with Antler! 🚀** 




 Are you a sales rockstar with bad luck with your current accounts and hence daydreaming of a new opportunity? We’re looking for a tenured salesperson to join our co-founding teams as a CEO. In this role you’ll be building a company from day zero with the ambition of making it the hottest new name in Silicon Valley. Though maybe you’re in a mission to make this world a better place and want to use your skills in making a lasting impact? In any case, get in touch with us to learn more.
 



  





**🌐 Who We Are** 




 Antler is an early-stage VC firm providing funding from pre-seed to Series A and above. We invest in Founders who seek to challenge the definition of our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 30 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**📅 The Antler program** 




 Join our 12-week residency with 200+ other highly driven entrepreneurs. Check out our website and see in detail how we will help you launch your startup.
 



**Program starts:** 
 19th of August, 2024
 



**Location:** 
 Onsite at our office in Stockholm
 



**Compensation:** 
 Participants will not receive financial compensation during the program. However, there is a potential for pre-seed investment to jumpstart your startup journey.
 



 As we’re not employing our founders, we’re unfortunately unable to provide visa sponsorship.
 



  





**🎯 For our August 2024 cohort, we're looking for someone who:** 



* Solid understanding of your industry’s challenges and opportunities, as well as the ability to apply insights to create impactful solutions.
* Experience leading teams, projects, or companies, with a track record of motivating others towards achieving shared goals and navigating challenges effectively.
* Exceptional analytical and strategic thinking skills, with the capability to break down complex problems and devise effective solutions
* Ambition to start building a VC-backable startup and understanding of what it takes to start building from day zero.
* You must speak fluent English to be able to follow the program.



  





**🧭 Our application process** 




 Embark on a straightforward 2-3 week journey:
 


* Apply via our website.
* Participate in the introductory interview.
* Proceed to a second interview with our partners.
* Potential Offer.



  





**🌍Diversity & Inclusion:** 




 At Antler, we take diversity and inclusion seriously. It's not just a trend, it is a core part of our organisational DNA. We foster an environment that encourages inclusivity, recognising the innovative solutions that diverse perspectives bring. Our data substantiates our commitment with 30% of our ventures are co-founded by women, and our founder pool represents over 120 nationalities.
 



  





**🌟 Meet some of our Nordic Portfolio companies:** 



* Circulate: Facilitating the adoption of sustainable packaging
* Skyqraft: Maximize electricity grid uptime with data
* Evyon: Pioneering planet-friendly battery energy storage.
* Glint Solar: Accelerating solar site identifications.
* PerPlant: On a mission to help farmers accelerate their transition into sustainable farming by democratizing access to artificial intelligence.



  





**OTHER, CAPTURING THE APPLICATION ON YOUR PLATFORM:** 



* Understanding of if they’re applying alone or as a team (applications processed differently)
* Currently teams are asked to submit information about their co-founders and pitch deck
* Confirming your eligibility for working at the job location. This is as we get a large number of applications from all around the world and as we’re not employing our founders, we’re unfortunately currently unable to support them with visa sponsorship.



  





**Why dream when you can build? Grab this opportunity and craft your own tech legacy with Antler.🌟🚀🌐**

title: Manager - Ancillary Coverage & Fulfillment
description:
**Etraveli Group is the globally leading company for tech solutions and fulfillment capabilities for online sales of flights. We are here to solve complexity, by connecting millions of flights and travelers across the globe, from search and selection to trip and beyond. We hold consumer online travel agency brands like Mytrip, GoToGate & Flight Network and serve Booking.com with flights. Etraveli Group has also established strategic partnerships with companies like Skyscanner, Google Flights, TUI, etc.** 




  





**Every day we strive to make the world smaller for our customers and bigger for our people. Our diverse team of more than 2300 passionate professionals is what makes us the industry’s tech wonder and the best in the world at what we do. Our major offices are in Sweden (HQ), Canada, Greece, India, Poland.** 




  





**The role** 




 Lead our Coverage and Fulfillment team to new heights in the Sales Ancillary department! With a team of skilled Ancillary Specialists and Business Analysts under your guidance, you'll lead the way in our quest for excellence in ancillary services. Your mission? Responsible for making sure we are best in class on ancillaries, by working towards 100% coverage of relevant products and close to 100% automated fulfillment.
 



  





 Elevate your leadership career with us as we redefine what it means to be best-in-class in the aviation industry!
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




 Responsible for the sourcing and fulfillment of all ancillary products, eg. airline products like bags, seat selection and meal selection, but also other products like e-visas, check-in, fast track etc.
 


* Break down the department objectives into team objectives and goals
* Defining processes and way of working for the team, and responsible for implementing/following-up on it
* Set relevant KPIs and monitoring of them
* Ensure high quality configuration
* Identify coverage gaps
* Optimize fulfillment methods
* Work closely together with Product Managers in setting technical requirements for new product/features
* Onboarding an coaching team members, helping them develop and reach both organizational- and personal development goals
* Troubleshooting and identifying business impact, responsible for escalating it to the relevant people
* Set processes together with Customer service/back office to identify and act on quality issues
* Set thresholds for what quality levels need to be met in order for us to have a product live



  





 As part of this recruitment process, we will be conducting background checks. You will be able to read more information and give your consent to this process in the application form.
 



  





**Requirements** 



* Experience working with GDS, NDC and/or LCC
* Proven ability to break down company strategy into tactics, execute and follow up on it
* Business minded
* Experience leading other people
* Familiar with analytical tools such as Excel, Looker and Qliksense
* Strong problem solving skills and willingness to roll up one’s sleeves to get the job done
* Skilled at working effectively with cross functional teams
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Relevant education



  





**Benefits** 




 Working at Etraveli Group means working at a fast-growing company with high ambitions in becoming the number one Online travel agency worldwide. The culture at the company embraces complexity and we like to keep the entrepreneurial spirit even as we grow into being a larger company. You will have awesome colleagues with whom you will have fun solving complex problems in a fast-moving business.
 



  





 We also offer:
 


* A flexible working environment. We work on a hybrid-model where you can choose to work two days from home and you will have two weeks per year that you can choose to work from a remote location
* Central office location in the City – We are located on Regeringsgatan in Stockholm, a stone's throw from public transport and lunch restaurants.
* Healthcare allowance – Each employee receives a maximum allowable amount each year according to the Swedish Tax Agency to spend on health-promoting activities such as a gym card, massage etc.
* Pension and health insurance – Through partners we offer a comprehensive pension and health insurance so that you can get help quickly in case of an accident



  





*At Etraveli Group we value diversity; we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds.* 
*During hiring, we are committed to ensure equality and promote diversity in the workplace at every selection stage. As such, we provide the same opportunities for all candidates regardless of race, religion or belief, gender, nationality, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, or any other characteristic protected under any anti-discrimination law or regulation.* 




  





**Welcome to Etraveli Group!**

title: Senior Paid Social specialist
description:
*Publicis Groupe is one of the largest communications groups in the world. We are building the agency model of the future and take a holistic approach to our clients’ challenges. By fusing together our media, creative, data and technology expertise, we are able to provide clients with integrated solutions, transformative ideas and compelling consumer experiences. We call it the Power of One.* 




*We are proud winner of many awards and nominations, both in Sweden and internationally. But nothing makes us prouder than to work with clients and brands such as Disney, Elgiganten, Mondelez, Essity, Volvo, VISA, Lantmännen, Nomad Foods, Lactalis, Midsona, Renault and many more.* 




*At Publicis, we put our people first. We are proud to be certified by Great Place to Work (2022, 2023, 2024), and have been recognized with a Magnet Award for our engaging culture (2023). Our goal is to become the leading workplace in our industry. We are based in a fantastic office in Odenplan, but also offer a flexible work policy.*



**Job Description**

 We are currently looking for a Senior Paid Social specialist to join our team. In this role, you will work alongside project managers and digital planners to execute impactful campaigns across various social media channels, including Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, Pinterest, and others. Your responsibilities will include ongoing social media purchasing, from strategizing and providing recommendations to setting up campaigns, optimizing them, analyzing their performance, and reporting on them. You will also be responsible for dynamic advertising and social commerce.
 



 As a Senior Paid Social specialist, your responsibilities will include the following:
 



 • Developing and implementing strategies across social media platforms
 



 • Designing dynamic campaign strategies for our clients
 



 • Creating tactical and dynamic campaign recommendations for paid social media
 



 • Planning, purchasing, optimizing, and continually reporting on social media campaigns, primarily for larger global accounts
 



 • Managing campaigns using self-service tools for purchasing, optimization, and campaign management
 



 • Building and maintaining dynamic feeds
 



 • Analyzing and evaluating campaign results based on predefined goals
 



 • Performing various administration tasks related to campaigns and customer work
   

  




**Qualifications**

 Skills and qualifications required for this position include:
 


* Academic or relevant post-secondary education in marketing.
* Proven experience in paid social media, whether on the agency or client side.
* A customer-focused approach, ensuring that ad campaigns align with the target audience's needs and interests.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills for client interaction, reporting, and team collaboration.
* A natural curiosity to stay updated on social media trends and industry changes.
* The ability to identify issues with ad campaigns and recommend solutions promptly.
* A collaborative mindset, working effectively with a team, clients, and other marketing professionals.
* Proficiency in the Smartly platform is a plus.


**Additional Information**

 In addition to a welcoming culture and inclusive environment with passionate colleagues we offer you:
 


* **Career Opportunities**



 Local and Global opportunities through the Power Of One.
 


* **Personal and Professional Learning**



 Global AI learning platform where you can participate in +30 000 classes and connect with colleagues from all over the world.
 


* **Flexible Ways of Working**



 We want to be an employer where work life balance is cherished. We love to spend time with our colleagues at the office but also believe in the output of your work not where the work is being done.
 


* **Work Your World**



 For six weeks a year, the world is yours. Every employee can work anywhere on the planet where there's a Publicis office. A new city, a favorite locale, or even a different country - Go. Grow. Explore.
 


* **Mental Health**



 The happiness and health of our people is paramount to us. We work continuously on maintaining a healthy and safe working environment through initiatives that facilitate the well-being of our employees.
 


* **Benefits**



 Generous benefit package.

title: Freelance Network Engineers
description:
We are looking for an ONSITE IT & Network Support Engineer/Technician to support Casual Freelancing type tasks in your area. Would you be interested in contractual tasks? you will be paid either on an hourly or daily/half-day basis. Tickets will be dispatched with respect to your area & you may support them as per your availability (weekdays, weekends).
 



  





  





  





 Tasks will be L1 & L2 IT/Networking related like desktop support, Server/Rack part (Hard disk drives, etc.) hardware installation & replacement. Provide on-site assistance (console access Router/Switch/Firewall etc.) to remote support.
 



  





  





  





 Base Skill Set:

title: Product Data Analyst
description:
**Company Description**
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.
   

  

 Sales is a global function within the H&M brand with the mission of growing and engaging our customer base, as well as growing and developing our sales channels. By holding the responsibility for our regions and bringing together expertise from both business and digital & tech perspectives, Sales plays a key role in delivering on our Brand Plan - to elevate H&M through product, experience, and brand providing aspirational fashion at an unbeatable price.
   

  

 The mission of the Customer Activation unit in Sales is to create a strategic plan that brings our brand direction to life through different touch points. Through data and customer insights, we design and execute a plan that will ensure a holistic customer experience from communication with our customer to our membership program.
   

  

**Job Description**
 In the role you will belong to the Product Data Analytics team and will be working within the product teams of the Value Stream Activate. Our Value Stream is developing and delivering a comprehensive range of products and features that cater to various stages of the customer activation journey. We enable tech solutions for our CRM and membership program, as well as across the media channels (Google, Meta, TikTok, Snapchat, etc.) By leveraging innovative technology, data-driven insights, and a deep understanding of customer behavior, we strive to create a seamless customer journey throughout the funnel as well as provide our regional teams and relevant business stakeholders with the tools they need to effectively engage, retain, and maximize the value of our customers.
   

  

 As Product Data Analyst you will be key in driving data-driven product development. As an essential member of the product team you will support in shaping product roadmaps, enable understanding of the value delivered by the product team, will set and monitor KPIs for measuring success, will provide insights supporting strategic decisions. We believe you have strong leadership to drive analytical agenda within the cross-functional team and across many stakeholders (global commercial teams, analytical community, business tech teams, possibly external partners).
   

  

**In this role you will:**
* Be responsible for understanding and communicating the value the product team delivers to our customers and our business.
* Support in creating business cases that would inform our product development roadmaps and make sure we prioritize the right initiatives, as well as follow up on how the value is materialized once the development has been delivered.
* Translate the analysis performed into actionable insights and effectively advocate the insights across various stakeholders within and outside the Value Stream.
* Use SQL, SAS, Google BigQuery, Google Looker, PowerBI and other analytical tools to dive deep into our data, as well as be an expert within data relevant for your product(s). You will also have an opportunity to drive requirements towards the teams building our data products.
* Advocate for data-driven product development by defining success metrics (OKRs and KPIs), driving a/b test agenda, setting tracking framework for the newly developed features to ensure we are collecting high quality data.
* Participate in the wider analytical community within Customer Activation, Sales and broadly H&M Group to grow our collective knowledge and skills.


**Qualifications**
* 2+ years of experience in analytics, preferably as a data analyst in an agile product team setting.
* Academic degree within Business, Economics, Statistics, Engineering (or similar).
* Knowledge in SQL and experience in handling large datasets across multiple data sources.
* Experience with digital and media data, as well as good command of customer data
* Understand online media metrics from advertising platforms such as Google, Meta, TikTok, Snapchat, etc
* Understand how online media use attribution windows
* Understand metrics from GA & GA4
* Strong business context related to the product data analysts works with
* Ability to synthesize data into clear insights and communicate complex problems in a simple way across different types of audiences (both technical and non-technical) in a matrix organization.
* Analytical mindset and ability to lead with data-driven insights within a cross-functional team.
* Preferred to have experience with GCP (BigQuery) or Databricks and from working with data visualization tools (Looker Studio, Looker, PowerBI, etc.)
* It is beneficial if you have experience of working with loyalty or membership programs.
* Preferred to have experience with web analytics data, a/b testing methodologies and tracking development.
* Fluent in English (written and spoken).


**Additional Information**
 This is a fulltime position with placement in Stockholm. If your experience, skills, and ambitions are right for this role, please apply with CV in English.
   

  

 Please do not send applications to individual email address, due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our career page. We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.

title: Network Engineer
description:
Duties: Lifecycle manage switches in access layer. The work includes planning, configuration, installation and removal of physical hardware as well as post-control.
 



  





 Shell requirements:
 



 Documented experience in operating larger TCP/IP-based (W)LAN/WAN.
 



 Documented experience in managing routing/switching and (W)LAN services.
 



 Work experience with Cisco equipment.
 



 Good knowledge of networking products from Cisco, HPE, Aruba.
 



 Used to document based on established routines.
 



 Good knowledge of the following protocols and services: IP, TCP, WAN, LAN, BGP, QoS, OSPF, HSRP, VXLAN, MPLS, DNS, DHCP and Multicast.
 



 We would like you to be certified in CCNP, CCIE or equivalent.
 



 You have good knowledge in network design, installation, configuration, troubleshooting and operation of complex network environments.
 



 Experience from working with real estate networks.
 



 At least 5 years of experience.
 



 Good ability to express yourself both orally and in writing in Swedish.
 



  





 Meritorious: Previous experience of working within the Client's network environment or good knowledge of it.
 



  





 Required Skills:
 



 WAN/WLAN
 



 CCNP
 



 Cisco
 



 TCP/IP
 



  





 Languages:
 



 Swedish (Proficient)
 



 English (Proficient)

title: IT-SUPPORTTEKNIKER
description:
Läkarmissionen behöver förstärka arbetet inom digitalisering, IT-säkerhet och IT-support. Vi söker därför en IT-supporttekniker till vårt globala kontor i Stockholm.
 



  
 


 Arbetsuppgifter
 * Vanligt förekommande arbetsuppgifter på en IT-avdelning som agerar supportfunktion i den egna verksamheten, inklusive datorer och telefoni.
* On och off-boarding av datorer och telefoner när ny personal börjar respektive slutar. I detta ingår licenshantering, introduktion av vår IT-miljö för medarbetare och kontakter med andra enheter inom organisationen.
* Inköp av IT-hårdvara för den svenska verksamheten och när tillämpligt för landkontor och regionkontor.
* Att stötta och ge support till kollegor, framförallt inom LMs svenska verksamhet, inom de olika system/program som används hos Läkarmissionen i samarbete med övriga IT-enheten, framförallt olika delar av Office 365 och Azure/Entra-miljön.



  




 Vi önskar att du har
 * Gymnasieutbildning inom IT eller motsvarande.
* Intresse för och helst erfarenhet av IT-support och att kunna självständigt felsöka begränsade problem för samtliga telefon- och datortyper.
* Vana av att arbeta systematiskt och noggrant.
* Goda kunskaper i engelska och svenska språken, kunskaper i franska eller arabiska är ett plus.
* God samarbetsförmåga – tjänsten innebär kontakter med hela organisationen.
* Intresse eller erfarenhet av det svenska civilsamhället är meriterande.



  




 Om tjänsten
 
 Delar av arbetsuppgifterna kan skötas på distans men större delen kräver närvaro på Läkarmissionens kontor i Vällingby, Stockholm. Vi har en blandad IT-miljö som inkluderar Windows, Mac, Iphone och Android.
 


* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på cirka 50-60%.
* Tillträde i mitten av augusti månad eller enligt överenskommelse.
* Vi tillämpar sex månader provanställning.



  




 Så här söker du tjänsten
 
 Skicka CV och ett kort brev om max 300 ord varför du är intresserad av och passar för tjänsten till 
 **personal@lakarmissionen.se, ange "Ansökan IT-supporttekniker" i ämnesraden** 
 . Lämna gärna löneanspråk i din ansökan.
 



  





 För frågor om tjänsten kontakta IT-ansvarig Henrik Hansson: 
 **henrik.hansson@lakarmissionen.se** 
 . Sista ansökningsdag är 30 juni men vi intervjuar löpande så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
 



  
 


 Om Läkarmissionen
 
 Läkarmissionen är en biståndsorganisation som verkar för hållbar fattigdomsbekämpning utifrån ett rättighetsperspektiv. Våra fokusområden är hälsa och välbefinnande, matsäkerhet och försörjning, utbildning och yrkesutbildning samt vatten och sanitet.
 



  





 Organisationen grundades 1958 och har idag cirka 400 anställda runt om i världen. Primärt arbetar vi för marginaliserade samhällsgrupper och kvinnor, barn och unga som lever i utsatthet. Vi fokuserar på arbete i Afrika, Latinamerika, Mellanöstern och Europa. Det gemensamma arbetet leds från Läkarmissionens globala kontor i Stockholm.
 



  





 Läkarmissionen arbetar långsiktigt för människor i utsatthet, oavsett deras nationalitet, religion eller politiska övertygelse. Verksamheten finansieras genom insamling från allmänheten i Sverige och institutionella bidrag.

title: Junior ServiceDesk technician to thrilling media company
description:
Welcome to the world of music and technology! In this role you will be instrumental in keeping the IT environment at the office running smoothly. Together with your team of IT desk colleagues you will solve all types of IT related issues whether its a phone, computer or printer that has a problem.
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm city
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 As soon as possible
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
   




**About the role**

 In this role you will work the IT ServieDesk and help collegues with various IT related issues. The work space is primarily working in Apple devices so if you have experience in supporting those its a plus.
 


  


 Our client boasts a dynamic distributed workforce that stretches the globe and uses primarily Apple devices with a mix of Windows and Linux laptops as well as various mobile devices. A wide range of SaaS solutions, that constantly evolve, help improve productivity and you'll be at the forefront of supporting the user IT needs to ensure they are contributing to the company's mission.
   




**Work tasks**
  
* You will provide excellent IT-support experience to our global collaegues working from anywhere
  
* Evaluate and work in our ServiceDesk and other support channels
  
* Manage escalated requests and give personal and remote support on hardware and software problems to fellow employees
  
* Work closely and drive some changes with other teams to make sure alignment remains on a global scale within the IT Support area
  
* Administration and support of i.e Google Workspace, JAMF and centralized user management (LDAP)
  

  


**We are looking for**

 We believe that you are a team player that actively collaborates with your team, and in other locations, to find solutions to problems. You are self-motivated and active with the ability to work independently. You are dependable, have a sense of urgency and are able to meet deadlines. You have communication and customer support skills, maintaining a professional demeanor at all levels of the business. You are flexible and willing to adapt to fast and often occurring changes.
 


  

  
* Language: English
  
* You need a Swedish work permit and/or citizenship
  
* You live in Stockholm and are able to start immediately
  
* You have experience from working with JAMF and ServiceNow
  
* Preferably you have experience from a similar role
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Flexible
  
* Has a strong technical interest
  
* Structured
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Nils Norgren or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on nils.norgren@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15105125

title: Företag inom IT-infrastruktur söker Field Service Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Är du en tekniskt kunnig och lösningsorienterad person med erfarenhet inom datacenter? Vill du vara en del av ett innovativt företag som ligger i framkant av IT-infrastruktur och tekniska lösningar? På uppdrag av kund söker vi nu en driven och engagerad Field Service Infrastructure Engineer för att stärka deras team och bidra till deras fortsatta framgång. Om du brinner för att leverera högkvalitativ teknisk support och vill arbeta i en dynamisk och utvecklande miljö, då kan detta vara möjligheten för dig!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Augusti
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 På uppdrag av kund söker vi nu en skicklig Field Service Infrastructure Engineer som kan arbeta på plats i deras kunders datacenter. Denna roll är avgörande för att tillhandahålla omfattande teknisk support till deras kunder och säkerställa smidig drift och distribution av kritisk datacenterinfrastruktur. Du kommer att bestå av ett team med nio kollegor med en spridning mellan kontoren i Borås och Stockholm. Det kan förekomma även förekomma jobb på annan ort.
 


  


 Kunden är ett ledande teknikföretag specialiserat på avancerade datacenterlösningar och IT-infrastruktur. De levererar tjänster inom bland annat datacenterinfrastruktur och IT-drift, säkra kommunikationslösningar, containertjänster, service och support 24/7, säkerhetslösningar, applikationsdrift och tredjepartsservice. De har strategiska partnerskap med ledande tillverkare och referenslösningar hos flera av Nordens mest krävande IT-verksamheter i både den privata och offentliga sektorn.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En dynamisk och stimulerande arbetsmiljö.
  
* Möjlighet att arbeta med spännande och utmanande projekt.
  
* Möjligheter till vidareutbildning och professionell utveckling.
  
* En tillsvidareanställning via Academic Work med fast månadslön. Goda möjligheter till överrekrytering efter 6 månader.
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Incidenthantering för kontinuerlig drift.
  
* Hantering av olika datacenteraktiviteter, såsom att byta ut nätverksenheter, konfigurera servrar, utföra strömcykler och hantera kabeldragning/patchhantering.
  
* Generera periodiska rapporter enligt kundens specifikationer.
  
* Delta i felanalys enligt anvisningar från kundens ingenjörsteam.
  
* Tillhandahålla logistiskt stöd för tillgångshantering och datacenterplanering.
  
* Erbjuda detaljerad feedback till kunder om eventuella tjänsteproblem som påverkar SLA
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har examen inom ett datorrelaterat område (datorvetenskap, elektroteknik, telekommunikation eller liknande).
  
* Har 3 till 5 års relevant teknisk support-erfarenhet.
  
* Har stark kunskap om lagring, nätverk och serverhårdvara.
  
* Har bekantskap med Linux- och Windows-skriptning.
  
* Har kunskap om distributionsteknologier (WDS, PXE, DHCP, FTP) och administration av Windows Server OS och WinPE OS.
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Certifiering inom CompTIA A+ eller motsvarande, CompTIA Server+ eller motsvarande, MCP/MCSE-certifiering.
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Flexibel
  
* Kommunikativ
  
* Noggrann
  
* Problemlösare
  
* Prestigelös
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Sophia Gyllenhammar eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sts04@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15105308

title: Network Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Are you passionate about client networks and remote access solutions providing the highest security for the services? Are you looking for an exciting job which offers excellent career development opportunities in a fast-paced environment? If so, you could be the Network Infrastructure Engineer we're looking for?
   

  

 In Swedbank you have the opportunity to:
   

  

* Move towards digital business ready infrastructure, paving the road for a standardised, scalable, and stable networks with resilient Data Centre set-up and a substantial cloud presence.
* Design, automate, and maintain endpoint networks for branches, campuses, and Savings banks to ensure the delivery of efficient, secure, appropriate, and reliable IT infrastructure services.
* Work on different layers of the infrastructure to make sure our services are up and running 24/7.
* Act as a team player and constantly contribute to the agile way of working.
* Support the Agile Product Owner in finding a good balance between life cycle management, maintenance, regulatory compliance as well as development.
* Do analysis and performs capacity and performance management for the services and infrastructure components.
* Acquire the knowledge and readiness to act as On-Call for the services maintained and developed by the team and to participate in incident solving and problem investigations.


 What is needed in this role:
   

  

* Demonstrated knowledge and experience in switching and routing (CCNP-level).
* Demonstrated knowledge and experience in 802.1x protocol (CCNA-level).
* Knowledge about Cisco Catalyst Centre (former DNA-c).
* Knowledge about Cisco Wireless products.
* Knowledge about Enterprise grade firewalls
* Some knowledge of scripting (Python and/or Ansible).
* Some knowledge about Azure.
* University degree in related field, or a great reason for not having one.
* Customer-centric mindset.
* Eagerness to continuous learning and improvement.
* Embracing change and development.
* Structured and systematic way of working.
* Solution-oriented thinking.
* Proficiency in English and Swedish, spoken and written.


 What we offer when you join us:
   

  

* An open, simple and caring culture.
* Opportunity to create the best experience for our customers.
* An international, sustainable and inclusive work environment.
* Development opportunities and advancement in your career.
* Flexible working options.
* Access to Group performance program, company pension plan, optional health insurance, and other benefits.


 "Join our team and...
   

  

* become a part of an international team of professionals, who jointly deliver modern and secure networks and remote access solution, maximizing user experience, customer’s value, and increasing Swedbank’s competitive advantage”, Ligia Godymirska, your future manager.


 We look forward to receiving your application by 28.07.2024.
   

  

**Location: Stockholm**
**Contacts**
 Recruiting manager: Ligia Godymirska
   

  

 We want to inform you that the selection process may begin after the summer holidays.
   

  

*We have made our choice regarding recruitment media and therefore kindly decline contact with ad sellers or sellers of other recruitment services.*
****Swedbank does not discriminate anybody based on gender, age, sexual orientation or sexual identity, ethnicity, religion or disability – everybody is welcome.****

title: Nätverkstekniker till Avanza
description:
Nu söker vi sig som nätverkstekniker till nätverksteamet på Avanza.
 



  





 Vill du jobba med ett nätverk som hanterar en av Sveriges tio största webbsajter och det system som lägger flest ordrar på Stockholmsbörsen? Brinner du för att designa och underhålla moderna, stabila och säkra nätverkslösningar? Då kan detta vara möjligheten för dig!
 



  





**Om Avanza** 




 Med mer än 1,8 miljoner kunder är Avanza idag det vanligaste sättet för svenskar att spara både kortsiktigt och långsiktigt genom investeringar i aktier och fonder. För att fortsätta förbättra våra produkter och på så sätt hjälpa våra kunder till en tryggare framtid söker vi dig som nätverkstekniker.
 



  





**Om tjänsten** 




 I tjänsten som Nätverkstekniker hos oss ansvarar du tillsammans med teamet för att säkerställa att vi alltid levererar stabila och snabba tjänster till våra kunder. Du kommer arbeta med allt ifrån kapacitetsplanering, designa arkitektur och underhålla system till att utforska nya tekniker. Du kommer även vara med och skapa nätverkstjänster som våra drifts- och utvecklingsteam kan använda sig av för att säkert och effektivt kunna leverera nya funktioner till våra kunder. Du bistår även organisationen med kompetens och rådgivning inom nätverksfrågor och lösningar.
 



  





 Du kommer även att arbeta med:
 


* Cisco ACI, ISE, ASR och Fortigate
* Förvaltning och utveckling av befintliga nätverksmiljöer och lösningar
* Felsökning av incidenter och problem
* Lastbalanseringslösningar och Brandväggar



  





 Du kommer att ingå i vårt Network-team med 6 härliga och kompetenta kollegor som har höga krav på att vår tekniska miljö ska vara modern och renodlad. Vårt nätverksteam är som en spindel i nätet gruppering som tillhandahåller en central tjänst/leverans till interna team och kollegor samt externa partners. Vi ser även ständigt över möjligheter till nya moderna tekniker som kan hjälpa oss att bygga en ännu bättre bank.
 



  





**Om dig och din kompetens** 




  





 Vi söker dig som är en riktigt duktig tekniker och som utmanas av att ständigt göra saker effektivare och snyggare. Du motiveras av nyfikenhet, är kreativ och engagerad samt ser teamwork som en självklar och naturlig del för att du och dina kollegor ska nå en gemensam framgång. Vi ser även att du bör vara bra på att hitta smarta lösningar och kunna förklara de på ett bra sätt för andra. Du är en bra kommunikatör som trivs med att arbeta enligt agila arbetssätt.
 



  





 Vi tror att du har
 


* Flera års arbetserfarenhet av liknande tjänst inom nätverk
* Tidigare erfarenhet av lastbalanseringar och brandväggar
* Erfarenhet av cloud networking, NX-OS eller SDN datacenternätverk är meriterande
* Goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift



  





 För att bidra på bästa sätt i rollen ser vi att du har god nätverks kunskap inom Cisco och/eller Fortinet. Har du även CCNP certifiering samt erfarenhet av lastbalansering är det ett stort plus. Det är även meriterande om du har tidigare arbetat med virtualisering eller cloud network. Har du erfarenhet av att skriva kod, gärna Ansible eller Python, så är det en fördel i tjänsten.
 



 Som person har du ett stort tekniskt intresse och gillar att lära dig nya saker. Kvalitet är viktigt för dig och du motiveras av att samarbeta med andra kollegor och gillar att dela med dig av din kompetens och erfarenhet.
 



  





**Vårt erbjudande till dig** 



* Ett team med hög kompetens och gott samarbete, ett team där vi bjuder på både skratt och delar med oss av vår kompetens
* Korta beslutsvägar, stort ansvar och mycket frihet
* En härlig arbetsplats med högt i tak, där alla röster blir hörda
* En coachande chef som bryr sig på riktigt
* Påverka människors liv till det bättre genom att demokratisera & tillgängliggöra sparande för alla
* Utmana finansbranschen och tänka nytt. Det enda som behövs är en idé som tillsammans med dina kollegor kan bli verklighet
* En trygg arbetsplats där man kan vara sig själv med en positiv, agil och engagerande kultur
* Hybrid-arbetsplats med härligt kontor på central adress



  





**Passar det här dig så sök redan idag! Vi går igenom ansökningar och träffar kandidater löpande!** 




  





 I den här rekryteringsproccessen arbetar vi med Amendo Tech. Vid frågor om rollen eller om oss är du mer än välkommen att kontakta AnnSofie Bott på 0704 201912 annsofie.bott@amendotech.se
 



  





**Välkommen in till oss!** 




 #IT

title: Skoladministratör
description:
*Montessori Mondial består av åtta grundskolor varav tre med integrerad förskola. Skolorna bedriver en modern och resultatinriktad montessoripedagogik med specialistutbildade lärare och optimala lärmiljöer. Montessori Mondial finns i Kristianstad, Malmö, Linköping, Lund och Stockholm. Montessori Mondial är en del av AcadeMedias grundskolor.*
 Är du genuint nyfiken på barns naturliga drivkrafter och höga potential? Vill du arbeta i en skola och förskola där barnens perspektiv värdesätts? Då är vi rätt arbetsplats för dig. Vi lyssnar in samhällets utveckling och anpassar alltid undervisningen efter barnet och inte tvärtom.
   

  

 Vi vet att struktur ger trygghet, att arbetsro skapar möjligheter och att respekt bygger självkänsla. Med beprövad Montessoripedagogik och moderna metoder ser vi till att eleverna når sina mål samtidigt som de lär sig att ta ansvar och lita till sin egen förmåga. På Montessori Mondial Nacka erbjuder vi våra elever en trygg lärandemiljö från förskola upp till år 9.
   

  

 Vi brinner för resultatinriktad montessoripedagogik. Gör du också det?
   

  

 Nu söker vi efter en skoladministratör - är det du?
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
 Som skoladministratör på vår skola så kommer du att arbeta nära skolledningen i form av chefsstöd inom följande områden: elev-, personal-, fakturahantering samt information till myndigheter.
   

  

 Vid hantering gällande elevadministration, så innebär det registrering av nya elever, köhantering, betyg samt andra elevresultat, arkivering och ärenden kopplat till myndighetsutövning.
   

  

 Inom området personal så hanterar du lönerapportering och är skolledningens chefsstöd gällande personaladministration kopplat till HR-systemet.
   

  

 Vid området ekonomi hanterar du fakturor samt beställningar.
   

  

**Din profil**
 För uppdraget behöver du som söker utbildning inom det administrativa området, ekonomi och IKT. Tjänsten kräver att du har erfarenhet av administrativa uppgifter från skolvärlden. Du har god IT-vana och har lätt för att tillägna dig olika system, som exempelvis Schoolsoft, Skola 24 och Plan Digital.
   

  

 Som person är du positiv, tillmötesgående och ser styrkan i samarbete tillsammans med andra.
   

  

 För att vara aktuell för denna tjänst ska du ha mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både gällande tal och i skrift. Då vi är en skola krävs ett utdrag ur Polisens belastningsregister. Tänk på att det kan ta upp till två veckor att få utdraget, så det är bra om du begär ut det i samband med att du skickar in din ansökan.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 Som en skola inom AcadeMedia erbjuder vi våra medarbetare kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling genom Academedia Academy samt intern och extern professionsutveckling. För oss är det viktigt att det går bra för dig och därför får du självklart kollektivavtalade förmåner och försäkringar men även friskvårdsbidrag, pensionsrådgivning och möjlighet till fördelaktiga köp genom netto- och bruttolöneväxling.
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning. Omfattning 20%. Tillträde 240805, eller enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Du är varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vårt rekryteringssystem. Tillsättning kan komma att ske innan sista ansökningsdag. Vid frågor kring tjänsten, kontakta gärna rektor Susanne Bäckström på mailadress: Susanne.backstrom@montessorimondial.se eller på 08-556 180 11
   

  

 Vi undanber oss vänligen men bestämt direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.

title: Cybersecurity Solutions Architect - Extended Vehicle Cybersecurity Architecture
description:
**Role Summary**
 Cybersecurity & Operations is a section comprising two groups at Scania Research & Development. We contribute to the operation and monitoring of Scania vehicles.
   

  

 We are currently seeking a cybersecurity solutions architect who wants to further develop our strategy and solutions and build our tactical ability within Architecture, Forensics, and Monitoring. This involves creating and maintaining the bridge between our operational capability and the defined strategy.
   

  

 We offer a dynamic work environment with numerous opportunities to shape the future.
   

  

**Your profile:**
 We are looking for a highly experienced Solution Architect with proven security knowledge. You should also be a team player with a can-do mentality combined with strong integrity and a structured way of working. To fit the expectations of the role, we expect you to be highly motivated by the mission described above, experienced, and able to thrive in complex environments with a problem-solving mentality, actively seeking improvements, and having the ability to guide others while feeling secure and maintaining focus.
   

  

 You have a graduate degree in Computer Science or equivalent. You have at least 7+ years of professional experience in IT or system development. Experience in a similar role is advantageous, and a good command of English is required. Swedish language skills are an advantage.
   

  

 If you believe this is your dream job and feel that you possess the necessary qualifications, please apply!
   

  

**Your role:**
 Your main tasks will involve working on security design in cross-functional roles with a strong emphasis on building cybersecurity monitoring capability across the electronic control units onboard, the extended vehicle (cloud services), and creating the foundation of an extended vehicle cybersecurity architecture, as well as strengthening Scania's forensic capability.
   

  

 You will have a mix of tasks related to product guidance, technology development, participation in planning activities, and deeper analysis of security requirements, improvement work, and governance. You will also support other teams in their collaboration with stakeholders inside and outside of Scania.
   

  

**Our offer:**
 We provide a healthy and inspiring workplace, respecting individuality, where you have ample opportunities to shape your work, our future, and Scania's strategy and tactical execution within the area. Your personal and professional development is important to us and is something we encourage and support.
   

  

 As a Scania employee, you are offered several benefits beyond personal and professional development opportunities.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

**For further information, please contact:**
 donatas.jokimas@scania.com, +46700813696 Manager, Cybersecurity Monitoring & Extended Vehicle Cybersecurity Architecture.
   

  

**A background check might be conducted for this recruitment process.**
 We look forward to receiving your application including a CV, and copies of any degrees and certificates. Selections will be made on an ongoing basis. You don't need to submit a cover letter but you need to answer the questions in the process going forward.
   

  

 Scania is a world-leading provider of transport solutions. Together with our partners and customers, we are driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. In 2020, we delivered 66,900 trucks, 5,200 buses as well as 11,000 industrial and marine power systems to our customers. Net sales totaled over SEK 125 billion, of which over 20 percent were services-related. Founded in 1891, Scania now operates in more than 100 countries and employs some 50,000 people. Research and development are mainly concentrated in Sweden. Production takes place in Europe and Latin America with regional product centers in Africa, Asia, and Eurasia. Scania is part of the TRATON GROUP. For more information visit: www.scania.com.

title: Executive Administrative Assistant to Major International Bank
description:
Do you have broad experience from administrative tasks and want to take the next step in your career? Are you also prepared to take on responsibilities in an international and reputable bank branch? We are now helping our client to find a dedicated person to join their team as executive administrative assistant.
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 HR / Office / Admin
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, 100%
 



  

**Start date :**
 July/August
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
   




**About the role**

 As an Executive Administration Assistant within the Corporate Bank, you will predominantly perform diverse secretarial duties requiring confidentiality, a strong work ethic and common-sense approach. Support requirements will vary from day-to-day dependent on the business covered and
   

**all applicants**
 should have a solid PA background and skill set with a strong degree of flexibility given the demanding nature of this role.
   

 The essence of this role lies within administration and communication. It involves contact with both internal and external people; peers, international co-workers and customers, and you need to have previous experience of similar tasks to be able to take on this role.
 


  


  

**You are offered**
  

 An international workplace with great possibilities to grow within your role. You will gain experience working in a global bank branch. You will also work with a dedicated consultant manager and receive Academic Works benefits and health care allowance.
   




**Work tasks**
  
* Advanced, proactive diary management, facilitating swift set-up of client meetings
  
* Complex, high volume email management (where applicable)
  
* Client facing position, internal and external client handling. Gate keeping both in person and over the phone
  
* Shared phone coverage for a busy group, involving significant interaction with clients and senior members of the firm
  
* Meeting, conference calls, telepresence set up - internally and externally
  
* Finalise complex travel arrangements: co-ordination of flights, check in, VISAs, accommodation and ground transportation logistics following a Corporate Policy. Manage a multitude of frequent changes at short notice and prepare travel itineraries
  
* Management of expense processing through Concur, reimbursement, personal amounts owing and account reconciliations
  
* System functionality expert - utilise internal systems, complete accurate data entry into internal management information systems and responsible for accurate collation of information to senior management
  
* Become integral part of business, understand group priorities and Banker expectation
  
* General administration duties (Room bookings, filing, photocopying, faxing) and partnership with assistants across the CIB group to provide coverage for absence where necessary
  

  


**We are looking for**

 To take on this role, we believe that you have well developed admin skills and that you are comfortable acting as "spider in the web". We think that you are good at handling lots of different things at once, and that you know how to keep the focus in a busy environment. Interpersonal relations is something that you value and you have strong communicational skills. A key requirement is also that you have a well developed language skills in both Swedish and English. Furthermore, we believe that you are a do:er who are comfortable to take initiatives and that you master the nobel art of time management.
 


  

  

****Essential skills/experience:****
  

  
* Professional client handling and relationship building with all client, Bankers and cover groups
  
* Full competency in diary management, can apply good judgment and has an understanding of competing priorities
  
* Strong, executive communication style
  
* Experience of effectively arranging travel, production of accurate itineraries, plan B & C, able to navigate systems well and apply good judgment on how to optimise travellers time
  
* Can demonstrate pro-activity and ownership within a role
  
* Strong technical capabilities
  
* Awareness of expense arena, expense systems and cost control initiatives e.g. can champion expense policy, process expenses in a timely manner and reconcile accounts accurately
  
* Polished, professional approach, calm and composed manner, ability to work in a pressured environment and partner effectively with peers.
  
* Exhibits a positive, common sense, constructive attitude to drive bankers schedule and help manage time effectively
  
* Is flexible, willing and open to change
  
* Can follow up without prompting and keep 1 step ahead of arrangement and requirements, displays good use of initiative and follow through to completion
  
* Has a high level of attention to detail and delivers high quality results
  
* Has an understanding of the culture of Investment Banking and the Corporate Bank
  
* Is a team player who can build networks and work in partnership. Solution orientated
  
* Is driven and can manage expectations through communicating proactively and often across different hierarchies
  
* Can quickly grasp the political landscape and key people within the organization
  
* Has potential to act as a role model to their peers e.g. lead by example
